mapper.select: SELECT A.COMMON_CODE_FCLTY_KIND AS COMMON_CODE_FCLTY_KIND, C.COMMON_NAME AS COMMON_NAME, A.FCLTY_RESVE_SN, A.FCLTY_RESVE_END_TIME, A.FCLTY_RESVE_BEGIN_TIME, A.FCLTY_RESVE_REQUST_MATTER, A.FCLTY_RESVE_EMPL_ID, A.COMMON_CODE_RESVE_AT, B.EMPL_NM FROM FCLTY_RESVE A INNER JOIN COMMON C ON A.COMMON_CODE_FCLTY_KIND = C.COMMON_CODE LEFT JOIN EMPL B ON A.FCLTY_RESVE_EMPL_ID = B.EMPL_ID ORDER BY A.FCLTY_RESVE_SN ASC
SELECT COUNT(COMMON_CODE_FCLTY_KIND) FROM FCLTY WHERE COMMON_CODE_FCLTY_KIND LIKE '%'||#{roomCode}||'%'

SELECT F.COMMON_CODE_FCLTY_KIND, LISTAGG(C.COMMON_NAME, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY C.COMMON_NAME) AS equipmentList, (SELECT COMMON_NAME FROM COMMON WHERE COMMON_CODE = F.COMMON_CODE_FCLTY_KIND) AS COMMON_NAME FROM FCLTY F INNER JOIN FXTRS FX ON FX.COMMON_CODE_FCLTY_KIND = F.COMMON_CODE_FCLTY_KIND INNER JOIN COMMON C ON C.COMMON_CODE = FX.COMMON_CODE_FXTRS_KIND WHERE F.COMMON_CODE_FCLTY_KIND LIKE '%'||#{commonCodeFcltyKind}||'%' GROUP BY F.COMMON_CODE_FCLTY_KIND

SELECT F.COMMON_CODE_FCLTY_KIND, C.COMMON_NAME AS COMMON_NAME FROM FCLTY F INNER JOIN COMMON C ON F.COMMON_CODE_FCLTY_KIND = C.COMMON_CODE WHERE F.COMMON_CODE_FCLTY_KIND LIKE '%'||#{commonCodeFcltyKind}||'%'

SELECT A.COMMON_CODE_FCLTY_KIND AS COMMON_CODE_FCLTY_KIND, C.COMMON_NAME AS COMMON_NAME, A.FCLTY_RESVE_SN, A.FCLTY_RESVE_END_TIME, A.FCLTY_RESVE_BEGIN_TIME, A.FCLTY_RESVE_REQUST_MATTER, A.FCLTY_RESVE_EMPL_ID, A.COMMON_CODE_RESVE_AT, B.EMPL_NM FROM FCLTY_RESVE A INNER JOIN COMMON C ON A.COMMON_CODE_FCLTY_KIND = C.COMMON_CODE LEFT JOIN EMPL B ON A.FCLTY_RESVE_EMPL_ID = B.EMPL_ID WHERE TO_DATE(A.FCLTY_RESVE_BEGIN_TIME, 'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) ORDER BY A.FCLTY_RESVE_SN ASC
